Description: This JSON file provides a data dictionary for the AHRQ data contained in the corresponding TSV file.

diagnostics.Description: diagnosis of dyslexia: oui = yes, non = no

diagnosishelped.Description: therapy helped oui = yes, non = no

diagnosisoral.Description: diagnosis of oral language disorder oui = yes, non = no

diagnosisadhd.Description: diagnosis of adhd disorder oui = yes, non = no

dysparents.Description: dyslexic parents oui = yes, non = no

dyssiblings.Description: dyslexic siblings oui = yes, non = no

dysrelatives.Description: other relatives oui = yes, non = no

primschoolrelreading.Description: primary school attitude 0 great 4 extremely poor

primschoolread.Description: primary school reading issues 0 none 4 many

primschoolreadaid.Description: primary school reading aid needed: 0 none, 1 friend, 2 parents/teachers, 3 special needs teacher, 4 speech therapist

primschoolortography.Description: primary school issues with swapping letter shapes and orders 0 none 4 many

primschoolgraphcolor.LongName: Primary School Letter and Color Name Issues
primschoolgraphcolor.Description: primary school issues in learning letter or color names 0 none 4 many

primschoolreadpeers.Description: comparison between skills in primary school: 0 higher than average 4 lower than average

primschoolreadtroubl.Description: homework completion issues: 0 lower than average 4 higher than average (compared to classmates)

primschoolloveread.Description: loved reading in primary school 0 a lot 4 not at all

primschoolspeedread.Description: primary school reading speed, 0 higher than average, 4 lower than average

primschoolbookn.LongName: Primary School Books Read Per Year
primschoolbookn.Description: number of read books in 1 year for pleasure: 0 = > 10, 1 = 6-10, 2 = 2-5, 3 = 1-2, 4 = 0

primschoolbandesdess.LongName: Primary School Comics Read Per Year
primschoolbandesdess.Description: number of comics read in 1 year for pleasure: 0 = > 10, 1 = 6-10, 2 = 2-5, 3 = 1-2, 4 = 0

currliferelreading.Description: current reading difficulty level 0 = none, 4 = a lot

currlifereadaid.Description: current life reading aid needed: 0 none, 1 friend, 2 parents/teachers, 3 special needs teacher, 4 speech therapist

currlifereadpeers.LongName: Current Reading Skills Compared to Peers
currlifereadpeers.Description: current life reading skills compared to peers 0 higher than average 4 lower than average

currlifewritetroubl.Description: current life writing problems 0 lower than average, 4 higher than average

currlifeloveread.Description: current life love for reading 0 higher than average, 4 lower than average

currlifereadpeers2.LongName: Current Reading Speed Compared to Peers
currlifereadpeers2.Description: current life reading speed compared to peers adjusted by age and level of education: 0 higher than average, 4 lower than average

currlifereadjob.LongName: Current Reading Requirement for Job or School
currlifereadjob.Description: how much work or school requires reading in current life: 0 = >40 hr/week, 1=30-40 hr/week, 2=20-30 hr/week, 3=10-20 hr/week, 4=<10 hr/week

currlifeinstrmemory.Description: problems in remembering complex oral instructions: 0 none 4 many

currlifeorthography.Description: current life orthography issues: 0 none 4 many

currlifemagn.Description: current life read magazines every month, online or paper: 0=>5, 1=3-4 regularly, 2=1-2 regularly, 3=1-2 irregularly, 4=0

currlifenewspapern.Description: current life daily newspapers read: 0 daily, 1 once a week, 2 from time to time, 3 rarely, 4 never

ahrq_score.Description: total adult reading history score, DERIVATIVE.
